bibl.title: An Egyptian Cohort in A.D. 117.
James Frank Gilliam, Roman Army Papers
bibl.author: Gilliam, James Frank

bibl.note: Reproduit de: Bonner Historia-Augusta-Colloquium 1964/1965 (Bonn, 1966) pp. 91-97. This note is concerned primarily with the recruits in P.S.I. IX, 1063 (= Roman Mil. Rec. 74).
Gilliam James Frank, An Egyptian Cohort in A.D. 117.
James Frank Gilliam, Roman Army Papers = Mavors Roman Army Researches. 2 (Amsterdam, 1986) pp. 309-315; - 444.
